actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for cost-of-living adjustments in rates of tax, zero bracket amounts, and personal exemptions.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide annual cost-of-living adjustments to the individual income tax rates, zero bracket amounts and personal exemptions.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for cost-of-living adjustments in rates of tax, zero bracket amounts, and personal exemptions.
